title: Service Fabric Yeoman Generators
body: Service Fabric Yeoman generators repository (Azure/generator-azuresfcsharp, Azure/generator-azuresfjava) provides project scaffolding tools for Service Fabric applications. Contains templates for C# and Java applications, reliable services, stateful/stateless services, and actor services. Essential for rapid Service Fabric application development and following best practices from project inception.
